divs: Sighting DetailsI was in a camp ground called petty coat junction. I was there camping with my brothers and sisters. I was about fourteen. i was looking up at the sky and saw bright lights. I thought at first it was a plane. It moved very siglintly and earaly flew over. I thought it was very eary and creepy. after about secounds, it just disapeared. After hearing Date Line`s documentery, I rememberd them saing about simalerobjects in that area of Pennsylvania.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Wellsboro
There was one other sighting in Wellsboro on or around November 30th 1979
